/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of shops and stalls that add a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy nature of the area. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with power lines that crisscross above the street. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
